bibl.title: The Art of Biography in Antiquity
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 77-84: Satyrus' Life of Euripides; - 101-117: The Life of Aesop; - 156-161: The Sayings of Jesus.
bibl.seg: 343 364 Aesopi Vita Biographi Euripides Satyrus Peripateticus
Tomas Hägg, The Art of Biography in Antiquity.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2012, 8°, xvi-496 pp. ISBN 978-1-107-01669-9. £70.
See in part. pp. 77-84: Satyrus' Life of Euripides; - 101-117: The Life of Aesop; - 156-161: The Sayings of Jesus.
C.R. par Tiziano Dorandi, Mnemosyne 4a s., 66 (2013) pp. 880-884.
